import React from 'react'; import { useHistory } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Helmet } from 'react-helmet'; import Navbar8 from '../components/navbar8'; import Footer4 from '../components/footer4'; import './history.css'; const History = () => { const history = useHistory(); const [isSignedIn, setIsSignedIn] = React.useState(false); // Change to true when signed in const [hasScans, setHasScans] = React.useState(false); // Change to true if scans exist return (
Scan History | Superior Unique Pigeon
{!isSignedIn ? (

🔒 Oops! The Pigeon ate your key!

You need to sign in to see your glorious scan history.

) : !hasScans ? (

📭 The Pigeon's mailbox is empty!

You haven't analyzed any emails yet. The pigeons are bored!

) : (

📜 Scroll of Ancient Pigeon Wisdom

{/* Map through scan history here */}

Subject: "You've won 1 million pigeons!"

Result: Definitely fishy 🐟

)}
); }; export default History;
